00002  *  maven Programming Language

00006 #include "maven.h"
00007 #include "struct_StringList.h"

00009 #include "enums.h"
00010 #include "objects.h"
00011 #include "constants.h"
00012 #include "variables.h"

00018 bool isRegisteringVariable(MavenCompiler* c, StringList tokens) {
00019         // what does it take to register a variable?
00020         // 1. must have a datatype.
00021         // 2. must not have brackets ().
00022         // 3. is allowed to have a default value, but be careful where its placed.
00023         // this function needs to be improved to work like dissectFunction()
00024         
00025         // skip other keywords
00026         int token;
00027         for(token = 0; token < tokens.length(); ++token)
00028                 if(tokens[token] != "public" && tokens[token] != "private"
00029                    && tokens[token] != "static" && tokens[token] != "constant"
00030                    && tokens[token] != "readonly" && tokens[token] != "writeonly")
00031                         break;
00032         
00033         // check data type
00034         string rawtype = stripRawType(tokens[token]);
00035         if(!isDataType(rawtype) && !objectExists(c, rawtype) && !enumExists(c, rawtype))
00036                 return false;
00037         
00038         // the rest
00039         for(int i = 0; i < tokens.length(); ++i) {
00040                 for(int j = 0; j < tokens[i].length(); ++j) {
00041                         if(tokens[i][j] == '=') return true;
00042                         if(tokens[i][j] == '(' || tokens[i][j] == ')')
00043                                 return false;
00044                 }
00045         }
00046         
00047         return true;
00048 }
